last_episode_to_air.name: Til death do us part?/The Aftermath
last_episode_to_air.overview: Jessica and Dre officially start their new life. Rachyl and Kerry’s tumultuous relationship reaches its final boiling point. Jackson faces consequences for his behavior. Alisa is caught off guard when Bryant makes a confession.

name: Music City
overview: A group of young musicians follow their dreams to make it in the business.

episodes.name: For All the Dreamers
episodes.overview: Rachyl put her dreams of becoming a lawyer on hold to support her husband, Kerry, in chasing after his goal of a country musician in Nashville, only to find out he’s not being honest with her.

episodes.name: Confidence Is Everything
episodes.overview: When Kerry becomes unresponsive during his tour, the reality of his absence makes Rachyl question their future. Jackson is ready to get closer to Jessica, but a surprise revelation may stand in the way of them getting more serious.

episodes.name: I'm Staying Here
episodes.overview: The road calls and Kerry considers taking a gig on a tour that conflicts with his wedding anniversary. When Rachyl informs Kerry that she is seriously considering law schools in other states, Kerry puts his foot down.

episodes.name: And the new miss Tennessee is...
episodes.overview: Jackson tries to take things slow with Jessica, until unexpected temptations drive him back to his old ways. When Rachyl receives a text from an ex, her past threatens to derail her present. Alexandra competes for the crown in the Miss Tennessee USA Pageant.

episodes.name: Text From an Ex
episodes.overview: Jackson has to decide if he's ready for a serious relationship with Jessica or if pageant girl Savana is more his speed; Rachyl struggles to tell Kerry about a recent text exchange with an ex who just moved back to Nashville.

episodes.name: Look Before You Leap
episodes.overview: Jackson decides to perform live on stage, but might be biting off more than he can chew, especially now that Jessica is no longer in his corner; Kerry progresses his music career when he connects with blonde singer, Brooke.

episodes.name: I like you better
episodes.overview: After Kerry comes home late after a night out with Brooke, Rachyl grapples with the state of their relationship. Jackson practices with Jessica for his upcoming birthday performance, but Savana becomes suspicious of how much time they spend together.

episodes.name: Look before you leap
episodes.overview: Jackson decides to perform live on stage, but might be biting off more than he can chew, especially now that Jessica is no longer in his corner. Kerry progresses his music career when he connects with blonde singer Brooke.

episodes.name: New Chances, New Choices
episodes.overview: Kerry wants to hire a publicist, Alexandra prepares for the Miss USA pageant, Jessica looks forward to her wedding, and Rachyl reconnects with an old friend.

episodes.name: Playing with Fire
episodes.overview: Alexandra forces Jackson to make a big decision, Alisa believes Bryant has a secret, and Rachyl gets closer to Jeremiah, which causes tension between her and Jessica.

episodes.name: Pity Party
episodes.overview: Alexandra gets revenge on Jackson for flaking, Kerry returns home to find Rachyl has been spending time with another guy, and Alisa confronts Bryant's photographer.

episodes.name: Marriage, Morals, and a Makeover
episodes.overview: Jackson buys a ring for Baylee despite his friends' concerns , Rachyl bonds with Alexandra after her fight with Jessica, and Bryant criticizes Alisa for lacking motivation.

episodes.name: Don't Go Chasing Waterfalls
episodes.overview: Jackson recovers from a serious car accident, Jessica considers not inviting Rachyl to her wedding, and Kerry continues to worry about Rachyl's relationship with Jeremiah.

episodes.name: When Life Hands You Lemons
episodes.overview: Kerry's publicist pressures him into doing a sexy photoshoot with a female model, Alisa takes a songwriting session with Luke Pell, and Jessica clears the air with Rachyl.

episodes.name: Team Stripper
episodes.overview: Jessica's bachelorette party takes an unexpected turn, Alexandra makes things awkward for Jackson and Baylee, and Bryant controls the fate of Alisa's song.

episodes.name: Between a Little Rock and a Hard Place
episodes.overview: As everyone travels to Arkansas for Jessica and Dre's wedding, Alexandra spills a secret, Alisa gets a surprise, Jackson becomes emotional, and Kerry learns the truth.

episodes.name: Til death do us part?/The Aftermath
episodes.overview: Jessica and Dre officially start their new life. Rachyl and Kerry’s tumultuous relationship reaches its final boiling point. Jackson faces consequences for his behavior. Alisa is caught off guard when Bryant makes a confession.
